name: Fist of Wrath
description:
LD43 game

Pesky humans forgot how to properly obey to their only patron! It's time to teach them the old ways.

You control fist of angry god and your goal is to destroy all non-believers before they kill you with their ignorance (and cannons).

Humanity inevitably grows and expands, your goal is to stop them.

I've started this project at 03.12, skipping one day of jam. However, that didn't stop me from finishing my game (but it stopped me from polishing it).

Graphics used:

https://opengameart.org/content/village-buildings (CC0)

https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-dungeon-iso-tileset (CC0)

Sounds were generated using SFXR

Note: Linux version is post LD enhanced one, with tutorial and some graphics from my friend.
